content: *k1 in mc k2 in cc repeat from * to end round 9 k2 in mc *k3 in cc k3 in mc repeat from * to last 4 sts k3 in cc k1 in mc round 10 k3 in mc *k1 in cc k5 in mc repeat from * to last 3 sts k1 in cc k2 in mc round 11 k2 in mc *k3 in cc k3 in mc repeat from * to last 4 sts k3 in cc k1 in mc round 12 *k1 in mc k2 in cc repeat from * to end round 13 k2 in cc *k1 in mc k1 in cc k1 in mc k3 in cc repeat from * to last 4 sts - k1 in mc k1 in cc x2 round 14 *k1 in mc k2 in cc repeat from * to end round 15 k2 in mc *k3 in cc k3 in mc repeat from * to last 4 sts k3 in cc k1 in mc round 16 k3 in mc *k1 in cc k5 in mc repeat from * to last 3 sts k1 in cc k2 in mc round 17 k2 in mc *k3 in cc k3 in mc repeat from * to last 4 sts k3 in cc k1 in mc round 18 *k1 in mc k2 in cc repeat from * to end round 19 k2 in cc *k3 in mc k3 in cc repeat from * to last 4 sts k3 in mc k1 in cc round 20 *k1 in mc k2 in cc repeat from * to end round 21 k2 in mc *k3 in cc k3 in mc repeat from * to last 4 sts k3 in cc k1 in mc round 22 k3 in mc *k1 in cc k5 in mc repeat from * to last 3 sts k1 in cc k2 in mc round 23 k2 in mc *k1 in cc k1 in mc k1 in cc k3 in mc repeat from * to last 4 sts - k1 in cc k1 in mc x2 round 24 *k1 in mc k1 in cc k3 in mc k1 in cc repeat from* to end of round copyright ©wickedgoodshari designs september 2020 - please do not copy or sell this design all attempts at making sure this pattern is correct have been attempted however if you find an issue please let me know enjoy �  pattern chart continue knitting in stockinette using mc until hat main colour measures 6 6½ 7 inches or desired measurement - contrast colour from cast on edge 27 26 crown decrease 25 24 round 1 *k4 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 23 round 2 and all other even rounds knit across the 22 round 21 round 3 *k 3 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 20 round 5 *k 2 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 19 round 7 *k 1 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 18 round 9
